to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: ttsynth help: download problem
body:
I read the message about getting viavoice working on Slackware 9.1 and 
tried to follow directions.  There were tons of errors.  Guess ttsynth is 
a bust after all as I'll probably never get working.

Mike Keithley
